alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 12:46AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Harris County through 130 AM CST... At 1239 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking training strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bush Intercontinental Airport to near Mission Bend. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. We are still monitoring weak rotation within some segments along this line. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Humble, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Aldine, Northside / Northline, Spring Branch North, Greater Greenspoint, Spring Branch West, Greater Heights, Spring Valley, western Memorial Park, Afton Oaks / River Oaks Area, southeastern Eldridge / West Oaks, Mission Bend, Near Northside Houston, southeastern Addicks Park Ten, Hedwig Village, Hilshire Village and Spring Branch East. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
